msbt.message: ...Huh? My pockets are full already! Should I swap it with something?
Swap it!
Drop it!
Look! I dug up !
...But I can't carry anything else! Should I swap it with something?
Swap it!
Bury it again.
...Huh? My pockets are full already! Should I swap it with something?
Swap it!
Bury it again.
...But I can't carry anything else! Should I swap it with something?
Swap it!
Let it go.
...But I can't carry anything else! Should I swap it with something?
Swap it!
Drop it.
...But I can't carry anything else! Should I swap it with something?
Swap it!
Forget it.
...But I don't have any room for it! Oh well. I guess I'll let it go.
I won't have room for this in my pockets if I pluck it, so I'll just leave it the way it is.
I was going to clean up a bit, but my pockets are full, so I'll just leave it like it is.
There's not enough room in my wallet and I can't carry this around with me right now, so I'll just leave it.
...Huh? My pockets are full! Guess I'll just leave this here, then.
...But I don't have any room for it! Guess I'll just forget it, then.
...Huh? My pockets are full already! Should I swap it with something?
Swap it!
Bury it again.
Ow! Ow ow ow... I got stung by wasps!
Aw, that itches! I got bit by a mosquito...<10_7 arg="180" />
Oh, good!All the pesky cockroaches are GONE! I feel so much better now!
I picked up a wasp nest!
I could probably use this wasp nest for something cool, like Yeah! I just came up with a DIY recipe!
I found treasure!
I found treasure!It probably belongs to an island resident. I guess I'll leave it here. For now...
I picked up !I should probably try to reunite this with its owner!
Somebody lost their !I bet it belongs to a resident of this island. I don't want to accidentally take it home, so I'll leave it here.
Somebody lost their !I wonder who lost it. I don't want to cause the owner any extra trouble, so I'll just leave it here.
This is someone else's treasure. It'd be rude to open it.
Someone lost this...
A well-used, well-loved picture book. There are little broken bits of candy between the pages...
This book is hard to read. The pages are warped, like they've gotten wet before. I think it's an exercise book.
There are lots of pictures of potted trees inside. It looks like an introductory guide to bonsai trees.
It's a novel. The author was obviously trying to be fancy by using lots of foreign words. I don't get it.
This novel looks really difficult. It's the kind of book only a voracious reader would think to pick up.
It's a comic. There's a girl with big, sparkling eyes on the cover. She's probably the hero.
It's one of those love stories that are so popular nowadays. It has a subtle aroma too. Or is that my imagination?
A book with pressed flowers inside. OH! It still has the price sticker on it!
This looks like someone's diary. Is this stain from drool? Maybe they fell asleep on it while writing.
Somebody scribbled something on the cover in pencil. Looks like it reads, "xtreme xercises"?
An old planner that's seen plenty of wear and tear. The last page has tally marks They are up to 12 now.
The cover of the book says "Mi diario secreto." I get the feeling I shouldn't look inside.
It reads "My Journal" in tiny letters on the cover. It's hard not to, but I probably shouldn't peek inside.
It's an autograph book, but it's covered with all kinds of sparkly stickers. It's making my eyes hurt.
I think it's a personal planner. Every line is filled in with precise, perfect handwriting. Err I should close this.
This looks like somebody's notebook. The handwriting is mostly illegible, but I can make out the word "Band."
This pouch is stuffed with something that smells delicious and is probably full of sugar.
A very simple bagthat's a tad open. I spot some gym clothes, I think.
A sturdy, old-fashioned sort of bag. It gets full points for utility and zero points for style.
It's a stylish bag. The complex design says more about style than it does about function.
An adorable handcrafted bag with something hard and rectangular inside. Maybe it's a book?
A bag made from a soft printed fabric featuring cartoon characters. It's all lumpy from being packed too full.
Maybe this is someone's makeup bag? It smells like lovely perfume.
A stylish bag adorned with gold metal spikes. It's got attitude!
This pouch looks like it's starting to tear in places. It's a little sticky too. Did someone spill juice on it?
A dusty, well-used bag. It vaguely smells like those minty sports creams that athletes use.
This classic pouch was built with functionality in mind, nothing more. It's the work of a craftsman. Maybe.
A stylish bag that looks like it could be popular. Whether it actually is popular might depend on the owner...
A bag with a simple design. I can tell it was painstakingly made by hand.
A snappy bag covered with buttons and pins of different pop stars.
A pretty bag that's been well-loved. It looks like it's been customized a number of times.
The front of the bag has embroidered lettering in gold thread. The words are..."Bikers Are More Fun."
My new life is underway... I can do whatever I want! WOO-HOO!
Yes! I finished paying off my home loan!
Sweet! I finally finished paying off my very last home loan!
I see. This totally makes sense!
I learned some pop hairstyles! I bet I could change up my look with a vanity or a mirror.
I learned some cool hairstyles! I bet I could change up my look with a vanity or a mirror.
I learned how to make some new hair colors! I bet I could change up my look with a vanity or a mirror.
I learned some tricks for organizing my belongings! I bet I can carry a bit more stuff now!
I've mastered the art of organizing! I bet I can carry a lot of stuff now!
I learned how to easily switch tools!
When I'm outside, I can press  to use the Tool Ring now.
When I'm outside, I can press  to use the Tool Ring! (On a horizontal Joy-Con, use  +  instead.)
I can make stronger tools that won't break so easily now! This is gonna be a material-gathering game changer!
I've got the Pro edition of the Custom Designs app now! I'm gonna make my debut as a pro designer!
Now I can do river construction with my Island Designer app!
Now I can do cliff construction with my Island Designer app!
Now I can make custom design paths with my Island Designer app!
Now I can make stone paths with my Island Designer app!
Now I can make brick paths with my Island Designer app!
Now I can make dark dirt paths with my Island Designer app!
Now I can make arched tile paths with my Island Designer app!
Now I can make sand paths with my Island Designer app!
Now I can make terra-cotta tiles with my Island Designer app!
Now I can make wooden paths with my Island Designer app!
Wow! Well, now that K.K. has performed, it's time to focus on making island life better and better. That means living each day to the fullest, doing things I like, and having lots of fun!
Whew! All the home and furnishing prep work is done!
Wait This means
All the home and furnishing prep work is done!
Alright! We reached our donation goal!
Now I've got the Nook Shopping app on my NookPhone! I can shop whenever I want, wherever I want!
Oh no! I guess that's it for my ...
Oh no! Thank you for your service, faithful ...
Oh no! It's the end of the line for my trusty ...
This old tire could be repurposed I've got an idea for a DIY recipe!
This empty can could be repurposed I've got an idea for a DIY recipe!
This boot could be repurposed I've got an idea for a DIY recipe!
This manila clam could be used as fishing bait I've got an idea for a DIY recipe!
Huh... OK!
SWEET! I learned a DIY recipe for !
Huh. So that's how it's done I just discovered a recipe for making a pitfall seed!
AH! II just came up with a recipe for a golden axe!
I could probably wear these if I found another boot, right? I've got an idea for a DIY recipe!
I sure have fished up a lot of trash I've got an idea for a DIY recipe!
If I made good use of the egg's patterning Oh! I've got some DIY recipe ideas!
If I combine the ideas behind the eggshell recipes I've learned so far I've got an idea for a DIY recipe!
Happy birthday to me! It's always nice getting to celebrate with good cake and good friends.
Supplies for getaway-package participants are likely inside.

This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.

This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.
Should I set this area aside as plot one?

Is this a good spot for the campsite?
Let me imagine it...
This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.
This seems like a good spot. Should I move the campsite here?
Let me imagine it...
This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.
There isn't enough space here.
I'm too close to the water. I need more room.
The ground isn't stable near these rocks, so I shouldn't try to build anything here.
I'm too close to the water. I need more room.
I'm too close to a cliff. I need more room.
I'm too close to the ledge. I need more room.
Everyone gathers in this plaza, so you should choose a different place.
If I place structures too close to each other, it'll block the flow of traffic. Better choose another place!
If it's too close to a bridge like this, it'll block the flow of traffic. Better choose another place!
If it's too close to an incline like this, it'll block the flow of traffic. Better choose another place!
This is too close to the plaza. I don't want anything to get in the way here. Better choose another place!
This is fairly close to someone's mailbox, so this isn't a good spot. Better choose another place!
I'll need to move the mailbox first.
It'll block the flow of traffic if it's too close to the pier like this. Better choose another place!
There's no river near here that I can place a bridge over!
To place a bridge, you need the river to be just the right width. And the land on either side should be even.
It'd be hard to use a bridge here with the other river so close.
It'd be hard to use a bridge here with the cliff so close.
I don't think it'd be a good idea to build a bridge on the sand here.
I don't see an even stretch of cliffs here where an incline could go.
If I put an incline here, the end of it will bump up against a cliff.
This is a little too high. I don't think I'll build an incline up here.
We'll have to do a little landscaping, but we can make this work. Should we go ahead?
OK!
I need to rethink it.
Is this a good spot?
OK!
I need to rethink it.
Should I move here?
Let me imagine it...
This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.
Should move here?
Let me imagine it...
This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.
Should the museum move here?
Let me imagine it...
This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.
Should the shop move here?
Let me imagine it...
This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.
Should the tailor shop move here?
Let me imagine it...
This is the spot!
I need to rethink it.
I set up my tent! That's a big first step!
I set up my tent! Now I have a home base for my new island life!
Blathers can set up his place now!
This is where the shop will go! I bet this island is about to become a whole lot livelier!
This is where the tailor shop will go! A wave of fashion will wash over us!
's got a place for tent now!
Looks like everyone has a spot picked out for their tents now. I need to get back to the plaza.
I picked a spot for a home to be built in the future. A new island neighbor is potentially a new island friend!
I picked a spot for a future home to be built. I hope it works!
I picked a spot for plot 1!
I picked a spot for plot 2!
I picked a spot for plot 3!
I picked a spot for the campsite! I hope lots of folks come by to visit.
I picked a spot for a bridge! Let the land connect!
I picked a spot for an incline! That's a step-up for this island!
I've picked a spot for my home! Starting tomorrow, I'll be getting a fresh start in a new location.
I've picked a new place for 's home! I sure hope likes it.
I've picked a new location for the museum!
I've picked a new location for the shop!
I've picked a new location for the tailor shop!
I picked a new location for the campsite! I hope we get even more visitors now!
I'm searching for treasure right now, so I'll look for a good place for this some other time.
My phone is ringing.
Oops! There goes my phone again.
